resources.string:
Call of Red Mountain uses the assets from Morrowind by Bethesda Game Studios (2002).
In order to play this game you must have acquired those files in some manner, they are not distributed with this game engine.
Please copy the Morrowind installation folder onto your device now, this can be up to 1.2Gb (or more) so you will need plenty of sdcard space.
You can copy it to any location that is accessible from your computer\'s file explorer.
There is a very out of data video of how to do this here, it uses old version of the Android operating system:
Call or Red Mountain setup demonstration

When you first start up Call of Red Mountain you will be asked to select the folder that contains the Morrowind.esm file on your device. From there the game engine will locate the other asset files relative to that esm file.

There are several pre-set start locations and configurations, or you can use the in game options menu to warp around.

Options and Free fly can be clicked in the character screen. Some Icons by Icons8 https://icons8.com

If you have some time and own the other Bethesda games: Oblivion, Fallout 3, Skyrim, Fallout4. You can copy the games files onto your phone and run ElderScrollsExplorer from the button at the bottom.
